slides.caption: Located at the center of it all, Century Plaza is transforming LA.

slides.headline: Century Plaza is the premier destination for shopping, dining, entertainment, hospitality and luxury living in Los Angeles.
slides.caption: Masters of architecture and design are turning Century City into Los Angeles’ most desirable pedestrian-friendly neighborhood.
Verdant landscapes and a commissioned sculpture by Jaume Plensa add vitality and spirit to the ground level plazas.

slides.headline: Moments away from Beverly Hills and Rodeo Drive, lush gardens weave together Century Plaza’s curated shops and restaurants seamlessly connecting it to Westfield Century City. For the first time in the city’s history, residents can live at the intersection of art, entertainment and culture. Welcome to the new Century City.

slides.caption: Since 1966, The Century Plaza Hotel has been hailed as a visionary in design and service.

slides.headline: The Fairmont Century Plaza Hotel, with its storied past, has been reinvisioned for the 21st-century with unrivaled services and amenities.
slides.caption: Once frequented by celebrities, foreign dignitaries and past presidents, the Century Plaza Hotel remains a Hollywood icon.
The open-air hotel lobby and bar connect seamlessly to the plazas, providing an inviting atmosphere to sit and relax.
The hotel is fully valet with lobby level and underground access, making your arrival and departure effortless.
The red carpet ready ballroom at Fairmont Century Plaza is the epitome of Hollywood glamour.
Lorem Ipsum dolor spenum more vetius poldas
Single- and double-story residences seamlessly blend indoor and outdoor living through multiple terraces, serene color palettes and natural materials.

slides.headline: The Fairmont Century Plaza Hotel Residences feature 63 fully-serviced pied-a-terres designed by Yabu Pushelberg. Owners will enjoy a full suite of exclusive amenities and Fairmont benefits. Among them, private entry and elevators with a 24-hour resident-only security gate.

slides.caption: Unprecedented service awaits guests and residents anywhere within the hotel, whether lounging poolside or relaxing at the spa.
Fairmont residents receive AccorHotels Platinum Level membership granting access to exclusive benefits at properties worldwide.
A 24-hour security gate provides tower residents with unparralleled privacy in Los Angeles.

slides.headline: The Tower Residences at Century Plaza redefine luxury living in Los Angeles. A gated vehicle entry unfolds to a procession of porte-cochere and lobby spaces, where restrained design, lavish amenities and expert personnel ensure comfort and convenience.

slides.caption: The tower amenities are abundant, with carefully considered spaces that cater to residents’ every need— both inside and outside.

slides.headline: Pei Cobb Freed & Partners and Yabu Pushelberg bring masterfully designed residences to the LA Skyline. Rising 44-stories above the city, floor-to-ceiling glass bay windows, glass-lined terraces, and column-free interiors afford breathtaking panoramic views from every room.

slides.caption: Spacious living areas are complimented by luxurious natural finishes to balance a celebratory openness with a cocoon-like retreat.
Panoramic views from the Tower Residences at Century Plaza.
